To
### a message, select it and then press the Delete key.
To delete mehr Nachrichten, select them by pressing and holding the Shift key. Then Release the Shift key and select Delete Messages.

To delete a saved message, select Menu -> Saved Messages. SÃ©lectionnez le message que vous souhaitez like to delete and then press the Delete key. If necessary, deletez le message de votre message Inbox as well.
